text: Sapir is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *André Sapir, Belgian economist *Edward Sapir, American anthropologist and linguist **J. David Sapir, his son, also an anthropologist and linguist *Esteban Sapir, Argentine cinematographer and director *Estelle Sapir, Polish Holocaust survivor *Gal Sapir, Israeli footballer *Jacques Sapir, French economist *Mark Sapir, Russian-American mathematician *Pinchas Sapir, Israeli politician *Richard Sapir, American novelist *Tamir Sapir, American businessman *Yosef Sapir, Israeli politician Michael Sapir , Sapir Real Estate Development is an American Real Estate Developer and Real Estate Billionaire in 2016. ==See also== *Sapir (disambiguation) Category:Hebrew-language surnames Category:Jewish surnames
title: Sapir (surname)
